name: Trivent
description:
Vertical shooter in development.

2 level ALPHA Demo released: 10/03/17

XBOX360 controller support. PS3/4 unknown but should work as well.

Z=Main weapon fire

X=Secondary weapon fire

C=Pause

ESC=exit game

R= reset game

Blue containers hold main weapon power-ups

Secondary weapon crates appear at intervals on screen sides.
